attributes.action: Stop airlines charging high fees for changing a name or date on an already booked and paid for ticket. Airlines should refund all taxes and charges, on cancelled and unused tickets for minimal or no charge to the customer.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Airlines make high charges to refund the paid taxes etc. on a ticket which is not going to be used.
Sometimes the charges are more than the taxes etc. on the actual ticket, so it is not worth claiming them back.
How come, the airline can charge such a high fee for the change of a name or time on a ticket?
We all know how quick it is to make a booking - so why so expensive to make a change?
All these charges are totally over the top and excessive.
The Banking Industry is no longer allowed to make excessive charges for administration, so why are the airlines allowed to screw us financially???
